trans-unit.resname: PSAL·J1 | Tolsimir Wolfblood | Card Name
PSAL·J1 | Tolsimir Wolfblood | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.resname: PSAL·J1 | Tolsimir Wolfblood | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Other white creatures you control get +1/+1.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他白色生物得+1/+1。

trans-unit.resname: PSAL·J1 | Tolsimir Wolfblood | Card Text | Paragraph 3

trans-unit.resname: PSAL·L1 | Jedit Ojanen of Efrava | Card Name
PSAL·L1 | Jedit Ojanen of Efrava | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

trans-unit.resname: PSAL·L1 | Jedit Ojanen of Efrava | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks or blocks, create a 2/2 green Cat Warrior creature token with forestwalk.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME进行攻击或阻挡时，将一个2/2绿色，具树林行者异能的猫／战士衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.resname: PSAL·B2 | Nullmage Shepherd | Card Name
PSAL·B2 | Nullmage Shepherd | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap four untapped creatures you control: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
trans-unit.target: 横置四个由你操控且未横置的生物：消灭目标神器或结界。

trans-unit.resname: PSAL·J2 | Fertile Imagination | Card Name
PSAL·J2 | Fertile Imagination | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose a card type. Target opponent reveals their hand. Create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens for each card of the chosen type revealed this way. (Artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal are card types.)
trans-unit.target: 选择一种牌的类别。 目标对手展示其手牌。 每以此法展示出一张该类别的牌，你便将两个1/1绿色腐生物衍生物放置进场。 （牌的类别包括神器、生物、结界、瞬间、地、法术。）

trans-unit.resname: PSAL·J3 | Sporesower Thallid | Card Name
PSAL·J3 | Sporesower Thallid | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on each Fungus you control.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，在每个由你操控的真菌上各放置一个芽孢指示物。

trans-unit.resname: PSAL·J3 | Sporesower Thallid | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Remove three spore counters from CARDNAME: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
trans-unit.target: 从CARDNAME上移去三个芽孢指示物：派出一个1/1绿色腐生物衍生生物。

trans-unit.target: 易质{1}{U}{B}（{1}{U}{B}，弃掉此牌：从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用与它相同的牌，展示该牌，并置于你手上。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。 使用的时机视同法术。）
